column4: anyone have any solutions? my network works but internet doesn't on intrepid
are you able to ping your gateway?
I can ping and connect to everything on the network, just can't access the internet
are you sure your DNS is working?
: nslookup fails: ';; connection timed out; no servers could be reached
any idea on how to fix it?
do you have any other computer on the network? if so, is it able to access internet?
yes, I'm using the other computer as a proxy to access the internet now
also another thing, the internet started working then randomly stopped
